name: Paper Ribbons in Pop Colors - Set of 4 Skeins
description:
A set of 4 brightly colored paper ribbons to be used for gift wrappings, craft projects, decorations and many more. 

Children love to work with paper ribbons - it always looks good no matter if it's glued onto a card, folded, ripped, knotted together, used as hair for a self-made toy, etc. Also it won't do any harm if it gets chewed upon - but please note that paper ribbon is not a toy and smaller children should work with it only under adult supervision.

A little water from time to will not damage the paper ribbon. Avoid excessive handling while the material is wet.

* * * * * 

Set includes 4 skeins with 5m / 5.5 yards of paper ribbon in the colors
- Fresh Green
- Viennese Magenta
- Turuqoise
- Navy Blue

name: Red Paper Twine on an Old Braider's Bobbin
description:
Red Paper Twine adds some colored touches to your ideas and projects - on a beautiful old braider's bobbin that is a treat in itself. At the same time it has a wonderfully rustic touch and the paper twine is strong for everyday use.

There are 44 yards (41m) of Red Colored Paper Twine on the bobbin. The twine is about 0.035 in (0,9mm) in diameter making it a great material for crafting projects, gift wrapping, decorations, etc.

The bobbins themselves are about 4.3 in (11cm) tall and come from former weaving mills. They are carefully selected by us and each is a little bit different but just as beautiful.

Looking for a different color? Have a look at the Paper Yarns & Paper Twines section to find your favourite color!

name: Four Wooden Vintage Bobbins with Fibre Ends
description:
Four Old Vintage Bobbins that were formerly used in a New England weaving mill to produce silks and other fine cloth - now they will add instant flair to your studio and home.

In the PaperPhine studio we use these bobbins and its bigger relatives as props in the product photography and to store our paper yarns on. They are also great to decorate your flat and studio or to make lovely candle holders if you put a simple white candle on top. The bobbins look especially great in duos and trios or in a whole row. And young and older children like to stack them up an build high towers.

* * * * * *

Size: approximately 3.75 in (9,5cm) x 3.15 in (8cm)
Weight: about 4.5 ounces (125g)

Made of a wooden core and fibre tops.

This listing is for four different vintage bobbins that might vary slightly from the ones on the photos. As you can see in the photos they come with differently colored ends and different inscriptions.

name: White and Natural Paper Yarns - 3 x 11 yards
description:
*

Fine Paper Yarn - 3 x 11 Yards for your Projects and Decorations

From PaperPhine
Fine Paper Yarn - 3 x 11 Yards for your Projects and Decorations
zoom
Fine Paper Yarn - 3 x 11 Yards for your Projects and Decorations Fine Paper Yarn - 3 x 11 Yards for your Projects and Decorations Fine Paper Yarn - 3 x 11 Yards for your Projects and Decorations Fine Paper Yarn - 3 x 11 Yards for your Projects and Decorations Fine Paper Yarn - 3 x 11 Yards for your Projects and Decorations
The thickest one? Or a bit thinner? This pack gives you the possibility to try out Paper Yarn as a material for your projects - or you can use it to decorate your products, to give a little something to your packages, etc.

There are ample possibilities to use Paper Yarn - crocheting, knitting, scarpbooking, weaving, using it for decorations or packing, etc. - to use it and it's sturdiness makes it perfect for projects in 3D.

This industrial Paper Yarn is made out of cellulose fibres/paper. A little water from time to time is no problem but it should not be left in water for too long.

You get 3 x 11 yards (about 10m) of fine Paper Yarn, the thickest and thinnest one in brown, the middle one in white (please note: the white really is white, no matter what your screen shows you).
